org.sakaiproject.email.api

Interface EmailHeaders


  • public interface EmailHeaders
    Common email header constants. These are defined in an interface as Strings because using an enum would have lost the use of dashes and created the need for more verbose enum code resulting in the same effect as this interface.
    Author:
    Carl Hall (carl.hall@et.gatech.edu)
